name: CVE-2018-14492
description: Tenda AC7 through V15.03.06.44_CN, AC9 through V15.03.05.19(6318)_CN, and AC10 through V15.03.06.23_CN devices have a Stack-based Buffer Overflow via a long limitSpeed or limitSpeedup parameter to an unspecified /goform URI.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:tendacn:ac7_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:tendacn:ac7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:tendacn:ac9_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:tendacn:ac9:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:tendacn:ac10_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:tendacn:ac10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:tendacn:ac15_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:tendacn:ac15:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:tendacn:ac18_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:tendacn:ac18:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
